statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_point;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY reorder_point DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity > 50 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < 20 AND reorder_point > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_quantity, (current_quantity - reorder_point) AS available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity, reorder_point, CASE WHEN current_quantity < reorder_point THEN 'Needs Restock' ELSE 'In Stock' END AS stock_status FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_quantity, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand < 10 ORDER BY quantity_on_hand ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM inventory WHERE last_updated >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_quantity_changed > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM inventory_items JOIN suppliers ON inventory_items.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT warehouse_name, location, shipment_date FROM warehouses JOIN shipments ON warehouses.warehouse_id = shipments.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT location, capacity FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
